about.description:
rubicon-ml is a machine learning solution designed to help standardize the model
development lifecycle. rubicon-ml can track, visualize and share experiments with
collaborators and reviewers as they develop, train and govern models designed
to solve complex business problems. It simplifies model governance, auditability
and reproducibility by tracking a wide range of model metadata.
about.summary: library and CLI for standardizing model development and governance

about.description:
rubicon-ml is a machine learning solution designed to help standardize the model
development lifecycle. rubicon-ml can track, visualize and share experiments with
collaborators and reviewers as they develop, train and govern models designed
to solve complex business problems. It simplifies model governance, auditability
and reproducibility by tracking a wide range of model metadata.
about.summary: library and CLI for standardizing model development and governance

name: rubicon-ml
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "rubicon-ml" %}
{% set version = "0.4.4" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/rubicon-ml-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 011ba87189cefee4207559f1a51e09b41f9556657d7b56e51a479f76c2d17263

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - rubicon_ml=rubicon_ml.cli:cli
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.8
  run:
    - click <=8.1.3,>=7.1
    - dash <=2.9.3,>=2.0.0
    - dash-bootstrap-components <=1.4.1,>=1.0.0
    - fsspec <=2023.4.0,>=2021.4.0
    - intake <=0.6.8,>=0.5.2
    - numpy <=1.24.2,>=1.22.0
    - pandas <=2.0.0,>=1.0
    - prefect <=1.2.4,>=0.12.0
    - pyarrow <=11.0.0,>=0.18.0
    - python >=3.8
    - pyyaml <=6.0,>=5.4.0
    - s3fs <=2023.4.0,>=0.4
    - scikit-learn <=1.2.2,>=0.22.0

test:
  imports:
    - rubicon_ml
  commands:
    - rubicon_ml --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/capitalone/rubicon-ml
  doc_url: https://capitalone.github.io/rubicon-ml/
  summary: library and CLI for standardizing model development and governance
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    rubicon-ml is a machine learning solution designed to help standardize the model 
    development lifecycle. rubicon-ml can track, visualize and share experiments with 
    collaborators and reviewers as they develop, train and govern models designed 
    to solve complex business problems. It simplifies model governance, auditability 
    and reproducibility by tracking a wide range of model metadata.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - joe-wolfe21
    - ryanSoley
    - mmccarty
    - dianelee217
